message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have 400k, but I want more!
I'll give you 300k, but I want the rest!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect it to last!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it!
You think you're clever, but I'm not done yet!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think I'm going soft!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
You think you're in control, but I'm not done yet!
I'll give you a tiny bit more, but don't think it's a sign of weakness!
You're almost out of time, take the last decent offer!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to squeeze more out of you!
I'll give you a tiny fraction, but it's all I've got left!
